create or replace PACKAGE pdm_ady_tapi_pck
IS
-- Table API package for table pdm_attribute_dependencies
-- Generated by VI TAPI generator version 6.2  (TAPI generated 03-Jan-2022  05:40:58)

-- Generated global constants
g_con_pack        CONSTANT     VARCHAR2(30) := 'PDM_ADY_TAPI_PCK';
g_con_table_name  CONSTANT     VARCHAR2(61) := 'PDM_ATTRIBUTE_DEPENDENCIES';
g_lock_conflicts  PLS_INTEGER := 0;


FUNCTION ady_select_row( i_ady_ID   IN  pdm_attribute_dependencies.ID%TYPE
                       , o_rt_ady   OUT pdm_attribute_dependencies%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

FUNCTION ady_select_row_uk1( i_ady_ADN_ID_BASE   IN  pdm_attribute_dependencies.ADN_ID_BASE%TYPE
                           , i_ady_SEQUENCE   IN  pdm_attribute_dependencies.SEQUENCE%TYPE
                           , o_rt_ady  OUT pdm_attribute_dependencies%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

FUNCTION ady_select_row_upd( i_ady_ID   IN  pdm_attribute_dependencies.ID%TYPE
                           , o_rt_ady   OUT pdm_attribute_dependencies%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

FUNCTION ady_select_row_upd_uk1( i_ady_ADN_ID_BASE   IN  pdm_attribute_dependencies.ADN_ID_BASE%TYPE
                               , i_ady_SEQUENCE   IN  pdm_attribute_dependencies.SEQUENCE%TYPE
                               , o_rt_ady  OUT pdm_attribute_dependencies%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

PROCEDURE ady_lock_row( i_ady_ID   IN  pdm_attribute_dependencies.ID%TYPE )
;

PROCEDURE ady_lock_row_nowait( i_ady_ID   IN  pdm_attribute_dependencies.ID%TYPE )
;


END pdm_ady_tapi_pck;
/




package body pdm_ady_tapi_pck
is




function ady_select_row( i_ady_id   in  pdm_attribute_dependencies.id%type
                       , o_rt_ady   out pdm_attribute_dependencies%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.ady_select_row';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   declare
      cursor c_ady ( i_ady_id   in  pdm_attribute_dependencies.id%type )
      is 
           select *
             from pdm_attribute_dependencies ady
            where ady.id = i_ady_id ;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         open c_ady( i_ady_id => i_ady_id );
         fetch c_ady into o_rt_ady;
         l_found := c_ady%found;
         close c_ady;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc 
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_ady%isopen
         then
            close c_ady;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end ady_select_row;

function ady_select_row_uk1( i_ady_adn_id_base   in  pdm_attribute_dependencies.adn_id_base%type
                           , i_ady_sequence   in  pdm_attribute_dependencies.sequence%type
                           , o_rt_ady  out pdm_attribute_dependencies%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.ady_select_row_uk1';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   declare
      cursor c_ady ( i_ady_adn_id_base   in  pdm_attribute_dependencies.adn_id_base%type
                   , i_ady_sequence   in  pdm_attribute_dependencies.sequence%type )
      is
         select *
           from pdm_attribute_dependencies ady
          where ady.adn_id_base = i_ady_adn_id_base 
            and ady.sequence = i_ady_sequence ;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         open c_ady(i_ady_adn_id_base => i_ady_adn_id_base, i_ady_sequence => i_ady_sequence);
         fetch c_ady into o_rt_ady;
         l_found := c_ady%found;
         close c_ady;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
   when others
    then
      if c_ady%isopen
      then
         close c_ady;
      end if;
      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

      viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end ady_select_row_uk1;

function ady_select_row_upd( i_ady_id   in  pdm_attribute_dependencies.id%type
                           , o_rt_ady   out pdm_attribute_dependencies%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.ady_select_row_upd';
   l_found                boolean      := false;

   cursor c_ady ( i_ady_id   in  pdm_attribute_dependencies.id%type )
   is
           select *
             from pdm_attribute_dependencies ady
            where ady.id = i_ady_id 
         for update;
begin
   viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

   
   open c_ady( i_ady_id => i_ady_id );
   fetch c_ady into o_rt_ady;
   l_found := c_ady%found;
   close c_ady;

   viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                          , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

   return l_found;

exception
   when others
   then
      if c_ady%isopen
      then
         close c_ady;
      end if;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

      viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );

end ady_select_row_upd;

function ady_select_row_upd_uk1( i_ady_adn_id_base   in  pdm_attribute_dependencies.adn_id_base%type
                               , i_ady_sequence   in  pdm_attribute_dependencies.sequence%type
                               , o_rt_ady  out pdm_attribute_dependencies%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.ady_select_row_upd_uk1';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   begin
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      
      l_found := ady_select_row_uk1( i_ady_adn_id_base   =>  i_ady_adn_id_base
                                   , i_ady_sequence   =>  i_ady_sequence
                                   , o_rt_ady => o_rt_ady );
      if l_found
      then
         
         l_found := ady_select_row_upd( i_ady_id => o_rt_ady.id
                                      , o_rt_ady => o_rt_ady );
      end if;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
      when others
      then
        viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                               , i_debug_info => sqlerrm);

        viu_info.raise_info(i_calling_procedure => con_proc);
   end;
end ady_select_row_upd_uk1;

procedure ady_lock_row( i_ady_id   in  pdm_attribute_dependencies.id%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.ady_lock_row';
begin
  declare
     cursor c_ady ( i_ady_id   in  pdm_attribute_dependencies.id%type )
     is
             select ''
               from pdm_attribute_dependencies ady
              where ady.id = i_ady_id 
         for update;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin
         
         if i_ady_id is not null
         then
            begin
                
                ady_lock_row_nowait( i_ady_id => i_ady_id );
            exception
               when viu_constant.exc_lockfailed
               then
                  
                  g_lock_conflicts := g_lock_conflicts + 1;

                  
                  viu_info.reset_package_variables;

                  
                  open c_ady( i_ady_id => i_ady_id );
                  close c_ady;
               end;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_ady%isopen
         then
            close c_ady;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info(i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end ady_lock_row;

procedure ady_lock_row_nowait( i_ady_id   in  pdm_attribute_dependencies.id%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.ady_lock_row_nowait';
begin
   declare
      cursor c_ady ( i_ady_id   in  pdm_attribute_dependencies.id%type )
      is
              select ''
                from pdm_attribute_dependencies ady
               where ady.id = i_ady_id 
          for update nowait;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin

         
         if i_ady_id is not null
         then
            
            open c_ady( i_ady_id => i_ady_id );

            close c_ady;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
        if c_ady%isopen
        then
           close c_ady;
        end if;

        viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                               , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

        viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_lockfailed
                           , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                           , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                           , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                           , i_additional_data   =>   'ID = "'||i_ady_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end ady_lock_row_nowait;


end pdm_ady_tapi_pck;
/
